content: OpenDOAR Repositories - Algeria http://www.opendoar.org Selected records from the OpenDOAR Directory of Open Access Repositories for Algeria en-GB 2015-03-20T04:14:30Z SHERPA, University of Nottingham OpenDOAR Database RSS Feed Generator OpenDOAR Logo http://www.opendoar.org/images/OpenDOAR.png http://www.opendoar.org/ Bouira University Digital Space URL:http://dspace.univ-bouira.dz:8080/jspui/ Organisation:Bouira University, Algeria Description:The University of Bouira offers visitors from Bouira University Digital Space free downloadable files of thesis: doctoral, master, master, courses in different technological and literary disciplines, proceedings of scientific conferences and scientific articles of a high level. Date Added:2013-11-21 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=2909&format=full 2013-11-21T10:28:46Z Biblioth\ufffd\ufffdque Virtuelle de l'universit\ufffd\ufffd d'Alger URL:http://biblio.univ-alger.dz/jspui/ Organisation:University of Algiers, Algeria Description:The repository contains the historical books and documents about Algeria from their collection which have been digitised and are openly available. The books date from the early years of printing to the 1930's for books written in the Arabic script and up to 1811 for books written in the Latin alphabet. Software:DSpace Size:10467 items (2015-03-03) Subjects:Geography and Regional Studies; History and Archaeology Content:Books; Special Languages:Arabic; English Policies:[Not yet analysed] Date Added:2013-10-21 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=2862&format=full 2013-10-21T15:11:50Z Cerist Digital Library URL:http://dl.cerist.dz/ Organisation:CERIST, Algeria Description:CERIST DL is the institutional repository of the Research Centre for Scientific and Technical Information, which has an online archive providing access to the entire production of CERIST. It includes scientific and academic research, audiovisual and related production. It was created to facilitate the deposit of digital content conference papers, technical reports or research, theses, course materials and other items. The interface is in French and it contains RSS feeds to alert users of new content. Software:DSpace Size:571 items (2015-03-03) Subjects:Computers and IT Content:Conferences; Theses; Unpublished; Books; Learning Objects; Multimedia Languages:French; English Policies:[Not yet analysed] Remarks:Many items require a login to view the content, but there are some items that are freely available. The Digital Library is currently in Beta.
